#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main(void)
{
    int t; cin>>t;
    string a,b;

    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>a>>b;
        short ca[26]={0},cb[26]={0},len=a.length();

        for(short i=0;i<len;i++)
            ca[a[i]-'a']++;

        len=b.length();

        for(short i=0;i<len;i++)
            cb[b[i]-'a']++;

        bool flag=true;
        for(int i=0;i<26;i++)
        {
            if(ca[i]!=cb[i])
            {
                flag=false;
            }
        }
        flag?cout<<"YES\n":cout<<"NO\n";
    }
}
